Sofia, Institute of Balkan Studies & Centre of Thracology, Bulgarian Academy of Sciences, ISBN: 978-619-7179-20-0, https://balkanstudies.bg/images/Cities_in_the_Balkans.pdf The newly published volume CITIES IN THE BALKANS: SPACES, FACES, MEMORIES. edited by Roumiana Il.
